original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhunisaṅghassa akālacīvaraṁ uppannaṁ hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuni saṅghassa akāla cīvaram uppannam hoti

original: Atha kho bhikkhunisaṅgho taṁ cīvaraṁ bhājetukāmo sannipati.
analyzed: atha kho bhikkhuni saṅghaḥ tam cīvaram bhājetu kāmaḥ sannipati

original: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā antevāsiniyo bhikkhuniyo pakkantā honti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyāḥ antevāsiniyaḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ pakkantāḥ honti
thullanandā bhikkhunī tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ etat avoca

original: “ayye, bhikkhuniyo pakkantā, na tāva cīvaraṁ bhājīyissatī”ti.
analyzed: ayye bhikkhuniyaḥ pakkantāḥ na tāva cīvaram bhājīyissati iti

original: Bhikkhuniyo na tāva cīvaraṁ bhājīyissatīti pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyaḥ na tāva cīvaram bhājīyissati iti pakkamisu

original: Thullanandā bhikkhunī antevāsinīsu bhikkhunīsu āgatāsu taṁ cīvaraṁ bhājāpesi.
analyzed: thullanandā bhikkhunī antevāsinīsu bhikkhunīsu āgatāsu tam cīvaram bhājāpesi

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā dhammikaṁ cīvaravibhaṅgaṁ paṭibāhissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā dhammikam cīvara vibhaṅgam paṭibāhissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṁ cīvaravibhaṅgaṁ paṭibāhatī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikam cīvara vibhaṅgam paṭibāhati iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṁ cīvaravibhaṅgaṁ paṭibāhissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikam cīvara vibhaṅgam paṭibāhissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikaṁ cīvaravibhaṅgaṁ paṭibāheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikam cīvara vibhaṅgam paṭibāheyya pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: kathaṁ imaṁ cīvaraṁ na bhājeyyāti paṭibāhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: katham imam cīvaram na bhājeyya ati paṭibāhati āpatti pācittiyassa
dhammike dhammika saññā paṭibāhati āpatti pācittiyassa
